title: Will Anthem Be Here in 7 Years? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.26.19
description:
Go to http://thirdlove.com/GAMES now to find your perfect-fitting bra and get 15% off your first purchase!

Boost is only available at http://Experian.com/KFGAMES

Gary Whitta and Greg talk about EA CEO's Anthem comments, Dr. Disrespect's reinstatement, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:17:12 - Housekeeping
It’s the project you’ve been waiting 1 year for. SUNDAY, the video version of Kinda Funny Prom goes live on youtube.com/kindafunny. Come see Smash Mouth shock the world, Greg marry two Kinda Funny Best Friends, and Tim and Gia crowd surf. Subscribe now!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Daniel Massey, Black Jack, Colton Yoder, and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:07:35 - EA CEO Andrew Wilson on Anthem, Mike Futter @ GameDaily.biz
00:20:03 - Dr Disrespect’s Twitch Channel Back, Nicole Carpenter @ VICE
00:50:50 - 505 Games has provided a statement regarding the current state of Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night on Nintendo Switch.
00:42:58 - Glen Schofeild (Visceral, Sledgehammer) joins PUBG Corp
00:44:20 - Ubisoft Watches Your Subtitles, Brendan Sinclair @ GIB
00:47:50 - Out today
00:51:50 -  THIRDLOVE
00:52:52 -  EXPERIAN
Reader mail   -
00:54:30 - Are algorithms the reason for streamer exhaustion? - Ryan Bickham
00:59:28 - Required Reading: The Human Cost Of Call of Duty: Black Ops 4 Jason @ Kotaku
https://kotaku.com/the-human-cost-of-call-of-duty-black-ops-4-1835859016
01:08:14 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Greg and Andrea
